name: @nozzlegear/react-win-pivot
description: An attempt to recreate the Pivot element from WinJS in React.
author: Joshua Harms <joshua@nozzlegear.com>

scripts.build: npm run validate && npm run build:ts && npm run build:css
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run esbuild --bundle --serve=localhost:5000 --servedir=. tests/test.tsx
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.lint: biome lint --write index.tsx tests/* css/* && npm run validate
